explanation: [0-0] A woman is sitting at a table, wearing a yellow short-sleeved shirt. On the table are a notebook and a pink pencil case. The woman is holding a silver object in each hand. The wall is blue, and on a white cabinet sits a plaster statue, next to a potted plant. To the right, there is a yellow shelf.
